content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Extraction System at (–3.5, 27.5)
Consists of:
– A burner inserter (extraction system burner inserter) with its drop position at (–3.5, 28.5)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of:
– A cable factory input chest at (2.5, 17.5)
– A factory burner inserter placed at (3.5, 17.5) using direction RIGHT
– An assembling machine (assembling-machine-1) at (1.5, 19.5)

### Belt Depot at (3.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
– A depot wooden chest placed at (3.5, 15.5) serving as the belt target
– A dedicated transport belt segment at (4.5, 15.5) adjacent to the depot chest
– A depot burner inserter placed at (3.5, 14.5) using direction UP

### Electricity Generator at (–0.5, 24.5)
Consists of:
– A steam engine (generator) at (–0.5, 24.5)
– A boiler at (–5.5, 24.0)
– An offshore pump at (–7.5, 25.5)

### Research Lab
Consists of:
– A lab (with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 17} and electrical_id 7106)
(Note: The lab’s position was not specified in the logs.)

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Transport Belt Connection Errors
  – Multiple attempts to connect transport belts failed because the target was a Prototype.SteamEngine object.
  – To avoid this, always add an inserter that feeds items into the steam engine and use that inserter as the target for belt connections.

• Wooden Chest Placement Errors
  – Placement errors occurred when trying to set a wooden chest at (3.5, 15.5) because the target position was out of reach; ensure the player moves within the allowed distance.
  – An error due to missing wooden chest in the inventory indicates that the required item must be available before placement.
  – A NameError (undefined ‘target_chest’) was encountered; verify that variable names for target entities are defined and used consistently.
